short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notifications from the ProjectKorra forums in chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to receive popup notifications from the ProjectKorra forums.

You don't have to provide your login details to this extension but you have to either have the page open or have remember password on.
